config.tacz.client.key.hold_to_aim.desc: True if you want to hold the right mouse button to aim
config.tacz.client.render.gun_lod_render: How far to display the lod model, 0 means always display
config.tacz.client.render.bullet_hole_pa: The existence time of bullet hole particles, in tick
config.tacz.client.render.damage_counter: Damage counter reset time of target minecart, in millisecond
config.tacz.client.render.bullet_hole_pa: The threshold for fading out when rendering bullet hole particles
config.tacz.client.render.hit_market_sta: The starting position of the hit marker when kill
config.tacz.client.render.head_shot_debu: Whether or not to display the head shot's hitbox
config.tacz.client.render.gun_hud_enable: Whether or not to display the gun's HUD
config.tacz.client.render.kill_amount_en: Whether or not to display the kill amount
config.tacz.client.render.target_render_: Самая дальняя прорисовка мишени, включая тип вагонеток
config.tacz.client.render.first_person_b: Whether or not to render first person bullet trail
config.tacz.client.render.disable_intera: Отключить взаимодействие с текстом на середине экрана
config.tacz.client.zoom.screen_distance_: Screen distance coefficient for zoom, using MDV standard, default is MDV133
config.tacz.client.zoom.zoom_sensitivity: Zoom sensitivity is multiplied by this factor
config.tacz.common.gun.default_gun_other: The range (block) of other gun sound, reloading sound etc.
config.tacz.common.gun.creative_player_c: Whether or not the player will consume ammo in creative mode
config.tacz.common.ammo.explosive_ammo_d: Warning: Ammo with explosive properties can break blocks
config.tacz.common.ammo.explosive_ammo_f: Warning: Ammo with explosive properties can set the surroundings on fire
config.tacz.common.ammo.explosive_ammo_k: Ammo with explosive properties can add knockback effect
config.tacz.common.ammo.explosive_ammo_v: The distance at which the explosion effect can be seen
config.tacz.common.ammo.pass_through_blo: Those blocks that the ammo can pass through
config.tacz.common.ammo.damage_base_mult: All base damage number is multiplied by this factor
config.tacz.common.ammo.armor_ignore_bas: All armor ignore damage number is multiplied by this factor
config.tacz.common.ammo.head_shot_base_m: All head shot damage number is multiplied by this factor
config.tacz.common.ammo.destroy_glass.de: Whether a ammo can break the glass
config.tacz.common.ammo.ignite_block.des: Whether a ammo can ignite the block
config.tacz.common.ammo.ignite_entity.de: Whether a ammo can ignite the entity
config.tacz.common.other.ammo_box_stack_: The maximum stack size of ammo that the ammo box can hold
config.tacz.common.other.default_pack_de: When enabled, the reload command will not overwrite the default model file under config
